thread.title: Comment on Solar Light And Phone Charger by siddiq
thread.title_full: Comment on Solar Light And Phone Charger by siddiq

author: siddiq
title: Comment on Solar Light And Phone Charger by siddiq
text:
Solar Light And Phone Charger Posted September 14, 2015 
The Shine is modern solar light and phone charger. It produces over 30 hours of light in a single charge, is waterproof and has a built-in phone charger. 
The built-in 5,000 mAh (19 Watt hour) backup battery has more than enough power to fully charge any smartphone. 
Tech Specs 
  the early bird price are gone, but you can still get it for $66, an estimated delivery is on Jan of 2016.
